casebody.data:
INSURANCE COMPANY
v.
BOURLON. No. 551A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 12, 2005. W. Russell Congleton, for John M. Bourlon. Gary S. Parsons, David S. Wisz, Raleigh, for Nationwide Ins. Co.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of October 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (John M. Bourlon) shall have up to and including the 21st day of November 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of October 2005."
